item.title: EP 247 - The Demon Made Me Murder That Man!
item.itunes:title: The Demon Made Me Murder That Man!
item.description:
Today we look at a strange murder in Alaska and then we examine a trial that almost allowed a demonically possessed man to blame the demon for his crime!

MERCH STORE!!!

https://www.redbubble.com/people/deadrabbitradio/works/35749420-dead-rabbit-radio?asc=u

 

Help Promote Dead Rabbit!

Dual Flyer

https://i.imgur.com/OhuoI2v.jpg

"As Above" Flyer 

https://i.imgur.com/yobMtUp.jpg

 

Alaska teen accused of killing friend for $9 million also faces federal child porn charges

https://www.cnn.com/2019/06/18/us/alaska-teen-friend-online-plot-shooting-death/index.html?no-st=1561057106

 

Teenagers murdered friend after man on internet offered them millions to film killing for him, police say

https://www.independent.co.uk/news/world/americas/alaska-teen-murder-denali-brehmer-cynthia-hoffman-darin-schilmiller-trial-police-a8964741.html

 

Trial of Arne Cheyenne Johnson

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Trial_of_Arne_Cheyenne_Johnson

 

The Demon Murder Case of Arne Cheyenne Johnson

http://www.the13thfloor.tv/2016/10/18/the-demon-murder-case-of-arne-cheyenne-johnson/

 

Listen to the daily podcast anywhere you listen to podcasts!

------------------------------------------------

Logo Art By Ash Black

 

"As Above" Art By Grant Scott

 

Opening Song: "Atlantis Attacks"

Closing Song: "Bella Royale"

Music By Dr. Huxxxtable

Rabbitron 3000 created by Eerbud

 

http://www.DeadRabbit.com

Email: DeadRabbitRadio@gmail.com

Twitter: @DeadRabbitRadio

Facebook: www.Facebook.com/DeadRabbitRadio

 

Paranormal, Conspiracy, and True Crime news as it happens! Jason Carpenter breaks the stories they'll be talking about tomorrow, assuming the world doesn't end today.

 

All Contents Of This Podcast Copyright Jason Carpenter 2018 - 2019
